dct_title_s: Street plan of the foreign settlement (central district) & French settlement at Shanghai
dct_description_sm: Drawn and Engraved for the Directory & Chronicle ; John Bartholomew & Co., Edinr.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Compass rose oriented with north toward upper left.
Shows roads (including projected), various locations (gardens, memorials, hospitals, post offices, temples, mills, etc.), wharves, waterways.
Map removed from "Directory & Chronicle," likely 1903 edition.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
